education.institution: Shri Vaishnav Institute of Technology and Science

highlights: Worked on Android frontend and Laravel backend for InnerVoice Android App.
Made the app more stable, fixed the bugs based on the analysis of ANRs and crashes on Crashlytics.
Collaborated with team in planning and addition of new features to the InnerVoice project.
Made certain parts of the UI more clear and user-friendly in their Android app.
Helped the team to detect certain UX issues in the Android version of the app.
Based on their suggestions and feedbacks, Worked on the fixes collaboratively with the team.
Implemented a better, visual way to display the statistics of the inventory in CDASH app.
Made label printing of the products easy for shop owners. Developed the LabelPrint app, enabling the user to print product labels using mobile devices.

projects.description: A platform to share quotes, short stories, oneliners with other app users.
